verses.verse: <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H7462>feeds<s%> on <S%H7307>wind,<s%> and <S%H7291>follows<s%> after the <S%H6921>east<s%> wind: he <S%H3605>daily<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H7235>increases<s%> <S%H3576>lies<s%> and <S%H7701>desolation;<s%> and they do <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H804>Assyrians,<s%> and <S%H8081>oil<s%> is <S%H2986>carried<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has also a <S%H7379>controversy<s%> with <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and will <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> according to his <S%H1870>ways;<s%> according to his <S%H4611>doings<s%> will he <S%H7725>recompense<s%> him.
He took his <S%H251>brother<s%> by the <S%H6117>heel<s%> in the <S%H990>womb,<s%> and by his <S%H202>strength<s%> he had <S%H8280>power<s%> with <S%H430>God:<s%>

Yes, he had <S%H7786>power<s%> <S%H413>over<s%> the <S%H4397>angel,<s%> and <S%H3201>prevailed:<s%> he <S%H1058>wept,<s%> and made <S%H2603>supplication<s%> to him: he <S%H4672>found<s%> him in <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with us;
Even the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is his <S%H2143>memorial.<s%>
Therefore <S%H7725>turn<s%> you to your <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and judgment <S%H4941><s%>and <S%H6960>wait<s%> on your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>
He is a <S%H3667>merchant,<s%> the <S%H3976>balances<s%> of <S%H4820>deceit<s%> are in his <S%H3027>hand:<s%> he <S%H157>loves<s%> to <S%H6231>oppress.<s%>

And <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H389>Yet<s%> I am <S%H6238>become<s%> <S%H6238>rich,<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> me out <S%H202>substance:<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H3018>labors<s%> they shall <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> in me that were <S%H2399>sin.<s%>

And I that am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> will <S%H5750>yet<s%> make you to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H168>tabernacles,<s%> as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H4150>solemn<s%> <S%H4150>feast.<s%>

I have also <S%H1696>spoken<s%> by the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and I have <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> <S%H2377>visions,<s%> and used <S%H1819>similitudes,<s%> by the <S%H3027>ministry<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets.<s%>

Is there <S%H205>iniquity<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead?<s%> <S%H389>surely<s%> they are <S%H7723>vanity:<s%> they <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H7794>bullocks<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal;<s%> <S%H1571>yes,<s%> their <S%H4196>altars<s%> are as <S%H1530>heaps<s%> in the <S%H8525>furrows<s%> of the <S%H7704>fields.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H1272>fled<s%> into the <S%H7704>country<s%> of <S%H758>Syria,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> for a <S%H802>wife,<s%> and for a <S%H802>wife<s%> he <S%H8104>kept<s%> sheep.
And by a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5927>brought<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and by a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> was he <S%H8104>preserved.<s%>

<S%H669>Ephraim<s%> provoked him to <S%H3707>anger<s%> <S%H8563>most<s%> <S%H8563>bitterly:<s%> therefore shall he <S%H5203>leave<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> on him, and his <S%H2781>reproach<s%> shall his <S%H113>LORD<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> to him.
